Starter Post - Twitter Embed

You can add social media content as embeds.

Nov 29, 2014 • Manav Sehgal • < 1 min to read • social embeds

You can add social media content as embeds.

Here is an example of a Tweet announcing OpenTheme.

Create Awesome Websites on GitHub for Free! http://t.co/tXj8H17vZE pic.twitter.com/2VCbLf0KrL

— Manav Sehgal (@manavsehgal) December 1, 2014

Tweet embed can be copied straight from Twitter embed link within a Tweet.
